Record.ClassificationPath: Endocrine System Diseases/Gonadal Disorders/Sex Differentiation Disorders/Hyperandrogenism
Record.Description: A condition caused by the excessive secretion of ANDROGENS from the ADRENAL CORTEX; the OVARIES; or the TESTES. The clinical significance in males is negligible. In women, the common manifestations are HIRSUTISM and VIRILISM as seen in patients with POLYCYSTIC OVARY SYNDROME and ADRENOCORTICAL HYPERFUNCTION.
